WeaponTraitDef.label: heavy rounds
WeaponTraitDef.description: These specialized rounds are loaded with heavier projectiles. Their immense kinetic energy delivers a powerful impact, making them exceptionally effective at staggering targets and halting an enemy's advance, along with a slight increase in overall damage.

WeaponTraitDef.label: hollow point rounds
WeaponTraitDef.description: These are hollow point rounds. The bullets are designed to expand upon impact, causing more severe wounds and significantly increasing overall damage.

WeaponTraitDef.label: tox rounds
WeaponTraitDef.description: These rounds are tipped with a potent toxin. They are designed not just to injure, but to poison, inflicting a debilitating toxic buildup on anyone they hit.

WeaponTraitDef.label: piercing rounds
WeaponTraitDef.description: These rounds feature a dense, hardened core, engineered to punch through armor and damage the target underneath.

WeaponTraitDef.label: incendiary rounds
WeaponTraitDef.description: These rounds are loaded with an incendiary compound. Upon impact, they burst into flames, inflicting burns and potentially igniting targets and their surroundings.

WeaponTraitDef.label: EMP rounds
WeaponTraitDef.description: These rounds are embedded with micro-capacitors that release a small electromagnetic pulse on impact, capable of disrupting electronics and temporarily stunning mechanoids.

WeaponTraitDef.label: high power rounds
WeaponTraitDef.description: Packed with a potent propellant charge, these rounds deliver devastating impact and enhanced armor penetration. This raw power comes at a price, however, as the severe recoil makes the weapon more difficult to aim accurately.

WeaponTraitDef.label: pulse charge rounds
WeaponTraitDef.description: Each of these advanced rounds contains a highly unstable energy cell. Upon impact, it discharges a powerful energy pulse, delivering exceptional damage and allowing it to punch through hardened armor.

WeaponTraitDef.label: incendiary pellets
WeaponTraitDef.description: This round is packed with an incendiary substance that fragments upon impact, creating multiple hot particles that make ignition highly likely.

WeaponTraitDef.label: tox pellets
WeaponTraitDef.description: This round shatters upon impact, releasing a spray of toxic shards. This ensures the target is thoroughly contaminated, leading to a debilitating toxic buildup.

WeaponTraitDef.label: birdshot pellets
WeaponTraitDef.description: This round is engineered to shatter into a cone of fragments upon firing. This pattern is highly effective at close quarters, but the fragments lose energy quickly, making them unable to penetrate armor or maintain accuracy at a distance.
